remarks: Derive the associative law for complex number addition ~ addass to demonstrate the use of ~ cnnv , ~ cnnvg , and ~ cnnvba .  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: cnnvdemo $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A + B ) + C ) = ( A + ( B + C ) ) ) $.
